name: NeonCycles
description:
I recommend downloading a binary instead of using the web version, if you can, as certain browsers sometimes have slowdowns or other issues.

Light up the path.

NeonCycles is a prototype game built in 24 hours in which your only means of offense is your neon trail. But be careful, it's dangerous to yourself as well!

Controls:

Player one:

  • Turn - left / right arrow keys
  • Speed up - up arrow
  • Slow down - down arrow
  • Esc to exit

Player two:

  • Turn - A / D keys
  • Speed up - W key
  • Slow down - S key

Attribution: https://github.com/voithos/neoncycles/blob/main/ATTRIBUTION.md

Thank you for playing! ❤️
